alert.note: Alert for Clark (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:06PM EDT until June 25 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Prospect, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Charlestown, Sellersburg, Bethlehem, Speed, Saint Joseph, Henryville, Clark Siding, Prather, River Ridge and Otisco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
